::Zardus/Perndabot::

Zardus lands a little ways off from the battle, looking at the fighting bots. 
He chuckles. The maximals didn't seem to be doing well.

Taking off again, he reaches the battlefield. His eyes widen as he sees 
Serpentor. He remembered that bot self-destructing in the alliance base....

Taking his launcher in one hand and an automatic in the other, he fires both 
weapons, a missile at Serpentor and several rounds at Unitron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot runs into the battlefield. The huge bot had left after Zergling and 
Nemesis, curious about the battle.

He jumps behind Sixshot, firing his missile launcher.
